reviews.review: Counter strike was the game that got me into Steam and PC gaming almost over a decade ago. Still fun to hop online every once in a while, and am always pleasantly surprised to see others still play even after all these years. I recommend any of the Counter-Strike games, but the original will always have a special place in my heart. 8/10
